languages.text: "Что? Считаешь, это я повинна в гибели Крудараха, мон-кай? Я шла своим Путем, как того требовали наши обычаи, и не могла знать, что мой мир настигла беда!"

traits.locale_text: "Что? Считаешь, это я повинна в гибели Крудараха, мон-кай? Я шла своим Путем, как того тербовали наши обычаи, и не могла знать, что мой мир настигла беда!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's demise, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"
languages.original_text: "Что? Считаешь, это я повинна в гибели Крудараха, мон-кай? Я шла своим Путем, как того требовали наши обычаи, и не могла знать, что мой мир настигла беда!"

traits.locale_text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's doom, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's doom, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's demise, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's demise, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's demise, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué? ¿Acaso insinúas que yo tuve la culpa de la destrucción de Crudarach, mon-keigh? ¡Estaba recorriendo mi senda, como dictan nuestras tradiciones; no tenía forma de saber qué había acontecido en mi mundo!».
languages.original_text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's demise, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? ¿Acaso insinúas que yo tuve la culpa de la destrucción de Crudarach, mon-keigh? ¡Estaba recorriendo mi senda, como dictan nuestras tradiciones; no tenía forma de saber qué había acontecido en mi mundo!».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「何だと？このモン＝ケイめ、クルダラが滅んだのは我のせいだと言うのか？我は、我々の習わしに従って自分の道を歩んでいて、故郷がどうなっていたかなど、知る由もなかったのだぞ！」
languages.original_text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's demise, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"

traits.locale_text: 「何だと？このモン＝ケイめ、クルダラが滅んだのは我のせいだと言うのか？我は、我々の習わしに従って自分の道を歩んでいて、故郷がどうなっていたかなど、知る由もなかったのだぞ！」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “什么？你是想说我该为克鲁达拉赫的陨落负责吗，猴子？我只不过是按照我们的传统，踏上了我的道途，我怎么可能知道我的世界发生了什么事情？！”
languages.original_text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's demise, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"

traits.locale_text: “什么？你是想说我该为克鲁达拉赫的陨落负责吗，猴子？我只不过是按照我们的传统，踏上了我的道途，我怎么可能知道我的世界发生了什么事情？！”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Quoi ? Êtes-vous en train de suggérer que la chute de Crudarach est ma faute, mon-keigh ? Je suivais ma Voie, comme le voulaient nos traditions, et je ne pouvais pas savoir ce qu'il était advenu de mon monde ! »
languages.original_text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's demise, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? Êtes-vous en train de suggérer que la chute de Crudarach est ma faute, mon-keigh ? Je suivais ma Voie, comme le voulaient nos traditions, et je ne pouvais pas savoir ce qu'il était advenu de mon monde ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Was? Wollt Ihr damit sagen, dass ich an Crudarachs Untergang schuld bin, Chem-Pan-Sey? Ich beschritt meinen Pfad, so wie es unsere Tradition verlangt, und konnte nicht ahnen, was über meine Welt hereinbrach!"
languages.original_text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's demise, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"

traits.locale_text: "Was? Wollt Ihr damit sagen, dass ich an Crudarachs Untergang schuld bin, Chem-Pan-Sey? Ich beschritt meinen Pfad, so wie es unsere Tradition verlangt, und konnte nicht ahnen, was über meine Welt hereinbrach!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ne? Crudarach'ın çöküşünden benim sorumlu olduğumu mu iddia ediyorsun mon-keigh? Geleneklerimizin buyurduğu üzere Yolumda yürüyordum, dünyamın başına gelecekleri bilmemin imkânı yoktu."
languages.original_text: "What? Are you suggesting I am to blame for Crudarach's demise, mon-keigh? I was walking my Path as our customs demanded, and could not have known of what befell my world!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Crudarach'ın çöküşünden benim sorumlu olduğumu mu iddia ediyorsun mon-keigh? Geleneklerimizin buyurduğu üzere Yolumdan yürüyordum ve dünyamın başına gelecekleri bilmemin imkânı yoktu."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
